message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to find it within my budget of $120. Would you be able to adjust the price?
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. Let me know if that works for you!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. Considering my budget, would you be able to offer the product for $125?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, Alice. Considering my budget, could you offer the product for $120?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $128, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
